title: Paros Greek Island Hilltop Beauty with Aegean Sea Views, Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Escape to a Cycladic dream at this resort perched high above the Aegean with panoramic views of picturesque Paros. This five-star haven invites you to experience epic sunsets and unobstructed vistas. The resort's design artfully mixes earthy tones and cosy wood and stone details that guarantee memories you'll cherish forever.

Imagine yourself floating in the infinity pool as the horizon blurs between the sparkling Aegean and the sky, or indulge in gourmet dining at the Tiger Moth restaurant for masterful dishes that capture the essence of Greek cuisine in a sophisticated setting. As the sun sets, sip on a refreshing ouzo lemonade at the pool bar before turning in for a dreamy sleep.

Designed to evoke a Cycladic village, the resort boasts sun-drenched balconies and serene wellness spaces for a deeply relaxing retreat amidst the turquoise backdrop of the mesmerising main pool. Whether you're in the mood for a romantic escape, a family vacation, or a fun getaway with friends, this destination ticks all the boxes.

vendor_name: Mr. and Mrs. White Hotel Paros
title: Ultra-Glamorous Boutique Greek Island Escape
description: It's all about the beautiful beaches, charming traditional villages, cosmopolitan bars and restaurants and fashionable resorts on the stylish Greek island of Paros. Experience the ultimate boutique luxury Greek island escape staying at the Mr & Mrs White Hotel, located just 10-minutes from the beach and vibrant village of Naoussa. Your package includes daily buffet breakfast, one multi-course dining experience, nightly cocktails and more.
offer_address: Αγ. Γεώργιος, Νάουσα, Πάρος, 84401, Paros 844 01, Greece

title: Boutique Paros Hilltop Retreat near Parikia with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Sea Views
description:
Between sun-drenched coastlines, cozy taverns and the boundless azure expanse of the Aegean Sea, the essence of the Cyclades thrives within the charming confines of High Mill Paros. Spend your days traversing secluded coves, exploring renowned diving sites or immersing yourself in the remnants of Byzantine history, only to return to the embrace of palm-fringed gardens, a magnificent central pool and panoramic vistas offering a front-row seat to Paros' legendary sunset.

Situated just minutes away from the old Parikia town and the island's ferry port, High Mill Paros serves as the quintessential launching point for travellers embarking on an odyssey through Greece's iconic islands. With Naxos, Mykonos, Santorini and Crete all within easy reach by boat, this hotel beckons explorers to embark on an effortless journey through the jewels of the Aegean.

title: Idyllic Paros Private Pool Villas with Aegean Sea Views
description:
Steeped in Cycladic charms and nestled along the sun-drenched shores of Paros, this private villa paradise blends timeless island luxury with modern style. Think milk-white hues, breezy, light-filled interiors, chic amenities, manicured Mediterranean gardens and shimmering private pools, all set against the azure backdrop of the Aegean Sea.

Spend your days soaking up the sun from your villa's terrace, rustle up your favourite meals in the fully-equipped kitchen and witness captivating sunsets from your secluded hilltop spot on the island. When you're not beach-hopping or trying out a variety of water sports, walk along cobblestone streets and explore the historic port town of Parikia, a short drive away.

title: Exclusive Paros Private Pool Suites with Panoramic Views over Aegean Sea
description:
Perched on a sun-drenched hilltop with sweeping views of the surrounding landscapes, this exclusive Paros retreat redefines luxury with just four elegantly designed suites, each featuring a sprawling private terrace and shimmering private pool. 

Blending Cycladic charm with contemporary sophistication, the serene setting invites you to unwind in absolute style. Explore Paros' traditional villages, pristine beaches like Golden Beach and Kolymbithres, tavernas and cafes, all within reach.

title: Greek Island Oceanfront Villas Overlooking the Aegean Sea with Beach Access
description:
This private villa haven sits majestically on Paros' Golden Beach, a prestigious oceanfront complex that embodies sophistication and indulgence. Positioned for serenity and unparalleled comfort, guests enjoy privacy and relaxation paired with easy access to a private beach and charming local villages.

Each villa is designed with high-end furnishings, modern amenities, private terraces and pool access, all framed by the stunning seascape. Beyond the accommodations, guests can enjoy watersports at nearby Kolympethres Beach, known for its turquoise waters and ideal windsurfing conditions.

title: Sersi Paros Suites - My Villas - Rentals
